argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_tposfun | |- ( Fun F -> Fun tpos F ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( Rel A -> ( Fun F -> Fun tpos F ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_dmtpos | |- ( Rel dom F -> dom tpos F = `' dom F ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( dom F = A -> ( Rel dom F -> dom tpos F = `' dom F ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_releq | |- ( dom F = A -> ( Rel dom F <-> Rel A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnveq | |- ( dom F = A -> `' dom F = `' A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( dom F = A -> ( dom tpos F = `' dom F <-> dom tpos F = `' A ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_3imtr3d | |- ( dom F = A -> ( Rel A -> dom tpos F = `' A ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_com12 | |- ( Rel A -> ( dom F = A -> dom tpos F = `' A ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_anim12d | |- ( Rel A -> ( ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) -> ( Fun tpos F /\ dom tpos F = `' A ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( F Fn A <-> ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( tpos F Fn `' A <-> ( Fun tpos F /\ dom tpos F = `' A ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_3imtr4g | |- ( Rel A -> ( F Fn A -> tpos F Fn `' A ) ) |
